title: $225 1 bedroom 1 bathroom FURNISHED
map_address: 95 S Service Road near Six Flags
posting_body: Affordable housing, fully furnished unit with all utilities included, available today!
Enjoy an entire fully furnished unit to yourself which includes 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom.
Rent includes all utilities, TV, refrigerator, microwave with laundry facilities available onsite and free parking.
When booking 7 nights at a time with our special weekly rates:
Month rates starting at $900.00/month including tax.
You must mention this ad to receive this special discounted price.
We only have a couple more units available so this special is available at a first come first serve basis.
****WE ARE ON THE MARTA & COBBLINC ROUTE****
The address is: 95 S Service Road.
